alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:25AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Logan and southwestern Gove Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 125 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Scott State Lake, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Logan and southwestern Gove Counties, including the following locations... The Monument Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
